Ingredients.4: 1 (10.5 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.5: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked

Ingredients.8: 1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.11: 0.5 teaspoon dried dill weed, or to taste (Optional)

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 2-quart baking dish.

Directions.2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes. Drain and return macaroni to the pot.

Directions.3: Stir in 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup milk, and the envelope of powdered cheese from the package. Add mushroom soup, tuna, and 1/2 cup milk; stir to combine. Pour macaroni mixture into the prepared baking dish; top with Cheddar cheese and parsley.

Directions.4: Mix bread crumbs, 1/4 cup melted butter, and dill in a small bowl; sprinkle over Cheddar cheese layer.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and the top is golden brown, about 20 minutes.
